name: The River (Canceled)
blurb: The River, a 3rd person action-adventure game that lets you explore a unique fantasy world inspired by South Pacific culture.

rewards.reward: Thanks for sharing your extra coins with us!  We at SvA salute you for supporting our cause!  You\u2019ll receive the forum rank: Bannerman of SvA!

Digital Copy + Rank\r\n\r\nThis price on pre-purchase of a digital copy of The River is only for you who are donating to the project during development! Not only will you receive a digital copy of the game when it releases but you\u2019ll receive a special in-game achievement and the forum rank: Scion of SvA along with access to the "backer's only" section of the forum.

Previous Rewards + Documentary + Digital soundtrack.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus a digital copy of the \u201cmaking of The River\u201d documentary and a digital copy of the game soundtrack. Forum rank: Zealot of SvA.
Previous Rewards + High-Res Art Book.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus a beautiful digital art book in PDF format. Forum rank: Revenant of SvA.
Previous Rewards + Illustration.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus an illustration from The River signed by SvA founders Sword, Axe and South. Forum rank: Shield Bearer of SvA.

Previous Rewards + Digital Lore Book.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus digital lore book in PDF formatting written by SvA founder Axe. The book will explore the myths, legends and history in the world of The River. Forum rank: Lightbringer.

Previous Rewards + Sword Vs. Axe T-Shirt.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus a Sword Vs. Axe t-shirt so you can represent your awesomeness to all your friends! Forum rank: Bladesman of SvA.

Previous Rewards + Sword Vs. Axe Hand-fired Clay Coffee Mug.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus a Sword Vs. Axe coffee mug. We love old-school gaming and crafting so you\u2019ll get to enjoy one of these wonderful hand-crafted SvA clay mugs.  Since they are hand-made, there are a limited number so hurry and reserve yours! Forum rank: Noble of SvA.

Previous Rewards + Special Thanks Credit.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus a special thanks credit in the game. That\u2019s right! Your name in the credits! Forum rank: Fury of SvA.
Previous Rewards + Early Beta Access.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus an early beta access key. Forum rank: Ambassador of SvA.
Previous Rewards + Cloth World Map.\r\n\r\nThis package includes all previous rewards plus an awesome cloth map of The River\u2019s layout. Forum rank: Navigator.

\u201cThe River Pack\u201d ($500 reward tier) = Previous rewards + Hard Copy.\r\n\r\nThis package is called \u201cThe River Pack\u201d. It boasts all previous rewards plus your very own limited edition box copy of the game!  You will also receive a phone call from the designers thanking you personally for your donation. Forum rank: Spirit Walker.
\u201cThe River Pack\u201d + Hard Copy Art Book.\r\n\r\nThis package includes The River Pack plus a hard copy of our beautiful art book signed by the founders of SvA! Forum rank: Warlord.

\u201cThe River Pack\u201d + SvA Collectible Figurine.\r\nThis package is for all of you who want to show off your dedication to this project with a limited edition figurine on your desk at work or home. It includes The River Pack plus a limited edition, collectible figurine of either our game's heroin or your choice of one of the Guardians!  Forum rank: Lore Keeper.

\u201cThe River Pack\u201d + Immortality.\r\n\r\nThis package is for you vain fans out there who want to be remembered forever. Immortalize your face by having an ancient in-game statue modeled in your likeness and it\u2019s lore and background influenced by you! You\u2019ll get to talk with the SvA team to help develop some of the lore that will be an essential part of the experience. Forum rank: Woe Slayer.

The \u201cEPIC SUPPORTER PACKAGE\u201d.\r\n\r\nTo you our most excellent of supporters, we offer our deepest gratitude. This package includes The River Pack, a very special Steam Achievement, a custom collectible figurine signed by the SvA team, Producer credit in the game and an invitation to our epic release party in Raleigh, NC where you will be honored in front of the crowd and your rewards will be bestowed upon you personally, in a manner fit for a king or queen. (Donor must pay for travel and lodging) Forum rank: Grand Master.
